name: Mission Lost Control (N64)
description:
The year is 2026, do you know where your pets are? This is your neighbor calling--they're over here on Mars fighting for a new backyard in this new 3D RTS for the N64!

16 levels, 2 species, 4 colors, up to 4 players. Collect pickups to mess with your friends as you battle for control!

Download the Mission Lost Control ROM for free. If you enjoyed it, consider supporting the project. If you really liked it you can purchase a physical cartridge.

*note: an N64 emulator or N64 with a flash cart are necessary to play the ROM of Mission Lost Control. Most compatible on flash carts & CEN64

Controls:

Base Commands: Open with Up C

Follow:  Up C

Attack: Right C

Defend: Down C

Upgrade Base: via control stick navigation

Base Upgrades:

-The speed upgrade makes minions respawn faster

-More base capacity allows a base to have more active minions

-The defense upgrade makes a base harder to capture

Created by Team Ultra Rare in 2021 for the N64 Brew Jam #2. Join the N64 Brew Discord.

Programmer & level design: lambertjamesd

Art, animation, level design, cutscenes: SapphireTactics

Audio (sfx and music): jtn191

Additional AI & audio programming, cutscenes: whatswithandy
